Reviews.Title: Very good product
Reviews.Author: DIMON  1080
Reviews.Content: Excelllent product, i have never saw a phone like that, i like very much and the box it came was a perfect size

Reviews.Title: Excellent compact cellphone
Reviews.Author: Alvarez L. A
Reviews.Content: Phone arrived as described, but no earphones and instructions manual in italian. Otherwise, very quick & easy to setup. Up & running in one hour with Whatsapp installation. My first experience with Android, do far, so good. Luckily, my 18 years old son is at easy reach when I have trouble understanding some features. Clearly I recommend it.
